api_list.api_description: Shortens a given URL using the is.gd service.

required_parameters.name: url
required_parameters.description: The URL you want to shorten.

optional_parameters.name: shorturl
optional_parameters.description: Custom shortened URL you would like to use (optional).

optional_parameters.name: callback
optional_parameters.description: Used only with format 'json' to specify a callback function (optional).

optional_parameters.name: logstats
optional_parameters.description: If 1, enables logging of detailed statistics (optional).

required_parameters.name: url
required_parameters.description: The URL to retrieve metadata for.

query: How can I shorten a long URL for my GitHub repository and then retrieve detailed metadata for the shortened URL?

api_list.api_description: Shortens a given URL using the is.gd service.

required_parameters.name: url
required_parameters.description: The URL you want to shorten.

optional_parameters.name: shorturl
optional_parameters.description: Custom shortened URL you would like to use (optional).

optional_parameters.name: callback
optional_parameters.description: Used only with format 'json' to specify a callback function (optional).

optional_parameters.name: logstats
optional_parameters.description: If 1, enables logging of detailed statistics (optional).

api_list.api_description: Take a screenshot of the target website.

required_parameters.name: url
required_parameters.description: The URL of the website to screenshot.

query: Can you create a short link for my personal blog and then take a screenshot of the blog page?
